DOC.brief_summary: During surgery for obesity, minimally invasive endoscopy can be performed and can assist the surgeon in determining surgical incision sites.
DOC.brief_title: Minimally Invasive Trocar Placement in Obesity Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Transgastric endoscopic access, without laparoscopic guidance, to the peritoneal cavity can be performed safely and guide trocar placement in morbidly obese patients undergoing Roux-en-y gastric bypass.
DOC.criteria: Elective laparoscopic RouxenY gastric bypass (LRYGB) surgery Lack of consent History of previous gastric surgery Contraindication to upper endoscopy
